data.meta_site_name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Wiki
data.text:
The Black Slab (黒の石板, Kuro no Sekiban) was a magic item with the power of generating clothing. It takes the form of a black stone slab the size of a person's head, with various inscriptions old and new etched all over it.[1]

Overview[]

Just like the old and faded fine print etched onto the slab says, the way of using the slab for generating clothes is to first place the needed ingredients around it, before pouring magical power into the magic item to activate the process, after which the ingredients will be magically transformed into the clothing, much like how chefs cook various cuisines based on what ingredients are given. As such, once the logic of the slab is understood, many recipes for generating different and exotic clothes can be concocted.

Originally the heirloom of a woman engaged to the man in black robes, the slab was coveted by a nobleman who was obsessed with clothes. Through all sorts of crooked manipulation, the nobleman was able to gain ownership of the slab as well as control over its owner, whom he interrogated for the way of using the slab. In the end though, the nobleman never found out how to make clothes with the slab, and accordingly forgot that it even existed.

Unbeknown to anyone else, the owner had secretly laid a curse on the slab, which targets the person who displays the most desire around it while it is used to generate clothing, though only one person at a time can get cursed. The cursed person will begin to desire the opposite of what he/she was desiring at the time of becoming cursed, and over time the opposite desire will turn permanent. The owner then etched the nature of the curse onto the slab in fine print, which Kazuma later speculated was for scaring the nobleman from using the slab if he discovered all the fine print on it, though it was also okay with the owner if the nobleman uses the slab without knowing of the curse and ends up turning into a good person.

A few years afterwards, the man in black robes stole the slab out of the nobleman's mansion along with a gem, and dropped them on the return route Kazuma's party took after a quest so that they will pick them up. When used by Aqua in a test run, the slab generated a set of girl's sleepwear utilising the gem as an ingredient, while also cursing the masochistic Darkness to make her desire sadistic control over others.

When the party became suspected of theft and was forced to make clothing able to affect their wearers for the nobleman, the slab was used to generate the requested clothing based on the recipes the man in black robes prepared and dropped off at Wiz's Shop. As part of his strategy to sell ingredients, Vanir also concocted a variety of other recipes for clothes that could either help lift the slab's curses on Kazuma's party, or were part of the clothing requisitions from Axel's inhabitants who heard about the slab's capability.

Following the lifting of the curse on Darkness, the slab next cursed Megumin, who had been resentful of her small breasts, into desiring to spread the goodness of flat-chested loli girls. After that curse was lifted too, the slab tried to curse Aqua, at the time longing for somebody to heal her feelings, with the desire to heal the feelings of people other than her through working for them, treating them to bubbly, and giving them massages. But her goddess aura instead rebounded that curse onto Kazuma, making his companions nearly miss the deadline for reverting him to normal.

After generating the School Invidia, Idol Superbia, and Sexy Luxuria requested by the nobleman as well as lifting the curse on Kazuma, the party gathered the ingredients listed on the recipe for the Berserk Ira, and placed them in their mansion as bait to catch the man in black robes. However, when they proceeded to generate the latest set of requested clothes for the nobleman, it turned out that the recipe was actually for generating the Armour of Wrath. The Armour began attacking anyone it sees, until Darkness put it on and walked out of the city while enjoying the unbearable pain it caused her to the countryside, where she stripped it off for Megumin to Explode.

In the confusion, the man in black robes, who had managed to steal the slab from the party, reclaimed the subdued Armour of Wrath, and utilising for ingredients it as well as the other three sets of nobleman-requested clothes he had previously stolen, he used the slab to generate a set of clothes containing all four emotions that can imbue him with enough power to enact his vengeance against the nobleman. However, doing so while displaying his strong desire to kill the nobleman caused him to be cursed by the slab, making him desire protecting the nobleman instead. The generated clothes were subsequently Stolen along with the slab by Kazuma, who sacrificed his life to restrain it by putting it on so that his companions can tear it up.

After such an ordeal, the slab's powers ended up being drained to the point only one more clothing generation was possible. Kazuma and his party thus chose to generate a set of clothes corresponding to the situation faced by the main heroine or sub-heroine who was most intimate with Kazuma, before fulfilling their promise with the man in black robes by returning the spent slab to its original owner's family.

Clothes[]

The clothes generated by the Black Slab are not only exotically designed and in quality as best as the ingredients provided allow, but can also be made to affect the feelings of the wearer. However, clothes with overbearing effects, such as those generated from recipes the man in black robes concocted, will cause excruciating pain to wearers who resist it that can possibly turn fatal.

When Kazuma generates a set of clothes not curse-related, he will test its effects by asking one of his party members to try it on if the clothes were requested by the nobleman. For those clothes requisitioned by other people, which can have slight differences in design and effect generated depending on whether ingredients for fantasization strengthening were used, he will in addition to his companions also ask Chris, Wiz, Yunyun, or Sena to model them out before delivery.

Requested by the nobleman[]

School Invidia

スクール・インウィディア

Schoolgirl uniform with blazer and hat, requested by the nobleman, that makes the wearer envious like when she sees her childhood boyfriend walking with a female friend.

It is able to move by its own will for displaying envy, and was later stolen from the nobleman to be used as an ingredient. Idol Superbia

アイドル・スペルビア

Idol costume with leather jacket and checkered skirt, requested by the nobleman, that makes the wearer so prideful she orders her male friend to break up with his lover.

It is able to move by its own will for displaying pride, and was later stolen from the nobleman to be used as an ingredient. Sexy Luxuria

セクシー・ルクスリア

Shoulderless nightgown, requested by the nobleman, that makes the wearer lustful in the manner of a bashful maiden meekly asking her boyfriend to advance their relationship.

It is able to move by its own will for displaying lust, and was later stolen from the nobleman to be used as an ingredient. Berserk Ira

バーサク・イラ

White cute dress with a yellow bow, requested by the nobleman, that makes the wearer silently wrathful like when she returned from a long trip only to see her boyfriend with another girl, though it was never actually generated.

For lifting the curse[]

Leather Fantasy

レザー・レスト Leather Lest

Black bondage dress, generated for lifting the curse on Darkness, that expresses the wearer's sadism. Pure Doll

ピュア・ドール

White lolita dress with bow, generated for lifting the curse on Megumin, that expresses the wearer's purity. Sexy Formal

セクシー・フォーマル

Bluish plain dress, generated for lifting the curse on Aqua, that emphasizes the wearer's lack of desire, though it was actually not needed as it turns out. Charming Roomwear

チャーミング・ルームウェア

Frilly camisole with loose-fitting shorts, generated because of a curse-induced desire, that enables relaxation to the wearer.

It was used in tandem with the sleepwear from the test run to lift the curse on Kazuma.

Requisitioned by townsfolk[]

Innocence Healer

イノセンス・ヒーラー

Nurse uniform, requisitioned by an novice priest, that can boost the power of Healing. Sexy Stripes

セクシー・ストライプ Sexy Stripe

Striped sweater, requisitioned by a young woman, that can make her boyfriend feel elated at her. Festive Elegance

お祭りみやび Festival Elegance

White yugata with blue flower patterns and red obi, requisitioned by a woman who cannot stand heat but wants something modest. Swimsuit A

スイムウェアＡ Swimwear A

Deep blue tie-on bikini, requisitioned by an anonymous person for a date. Cute & Small

キュート・リトル Cute Little

Orange vest over white T-shirt with short jeans, requisitioned by the mother of a young child, that is durable and allows playing. School Swimsuit

スクール・スイムウェア School Swimwear

Schoolgirl swimsuit, requisitioned by a little girl, that is modest, durable, and suited for small breasts. Tropical Cheer

トロピカル・チア

Cheerleader costume with black top and orange skirt, requisitioned by Dust so he can have someone motivate him. Swimsuit M

スイムウェアＭ Swimwear M

Red two-piece swimsuit with skirt bottom, requisitioned by a mature girl so she can look sexy. Sweet Honey

スイート・ハニー

White shirt, requisitioned by a man who recently got a girlfriend, in preparation for the situation where she comes visiting his room unexpectedly. Pure Princess

ピュア・プリンセス

Glamourous party dress, requisitioned by a noblewoman, that can relieve the torment from wearing corsettes. Cool Lady

クール・レディ

Translucent jacket over chestband and short jeans, requisitioned by an unattractive woman so she can experience having men attracted to her. Swimsuit D

スイムウェアＤ Swimwear D

Yellow tie-on bikini, requisitioned by a maiden troubled by the largeness of her breasts, that suits healthy busty women without looking too lewd. Classic Uniform

スクール・セーラー School Sailor

Schoolgirl sailor uniform, requisitioned by Luna as a birthday present for a colleague. Pure One-Piece

ピュア・ワンピース

Checkered one piece dress, requisitioned by an untidy woman so she can look pure before her boyfriend. School Runner

スクール・ランニング School Running

Sports uniform, requisitioned by a thief woman, that is water resistant as well as not tearing easily. Swimsuit C

スイムウェアＣ Swimwear C

White tie-on bikini, requisitioned by a girl on the street, that not only allows her to exercise while showing her cuteness but also contains pads on the chest. Lovely Apron

ラブリー・エプロン

Frilly apron dress composed of two pieces, requisitioned by Wiz as a gift to a newly-wed patron. Sweet Vorpal Bunny

スイート・ヴォーパルバニー

Bunny costume, requisitioned by a fan of Wiz's Magic Shop for attracting customers before it goes broke. Charming Bathtime

チャーミング・バススタイル Charming Bath Style

Light green bathtowel, requisitioned by a woman with sensitive skin, that can absorb water without rubbing. Swimsuit W

スイムウェアＷ Swimwear W

Purple tie-on bikini with skirt bottom, requisitioned by a bar waitress, that looks cute on a mature woman. Easygoing Uniform

スクール・ギャル School Gal

Schoolgirl uniform with tie, requisitioned by a mature and cute girl, that increases her attractiveness by making her look both naughty and cute. Cute Maiden

キュート・メイデン

Cute maid dress, requisitioned by an eatery owner for his waitresses to wear so his shop's earnings can improve. Cute Lady

キュート・レディ

Loose blouse with checkered shorts and red hat, requisitioned by a headstrong woman to help her get spoiled by her boyfriend. Swimsuit Y

スイムウェアＹ Swimwear Y

Black tie-on bikini, requisitioned by a maiden fallen in love so she can attract the attention of the older man. Pajama Party

パジャマパーティ

Strapped nightie, requisitioned by Sena, that can help her fall asleep. Regal Maiden

クール・メイデン Cool Maiden

Modest maid dress, requisitioned by a husband with many worries, that makes his frightening wife act meekly. Sexy Cheongsam

セクシー・マンダリン Sexy Mandarin

Red qipao, requisitioned by a beautiful woman so she can stand out at social parties. Swimsuit S

スイムウェアＳ Swimwear S

White tie-on bikini, requisitioned by a cool woman, that suits her personality. Deluxe Aqua Super Megumin

イマジン・めぐみん Imagine Megumin

Black bikini with red frills and yellow embroidering or red bikini, requisitioned by a little girl, that was designed to look like Megumin's outfit. Extra Darkness

Conspired for vengeance[]

Armour of Wrath

憤怒の鎧

A set of scarlet armour, conspired into generation by the man in black robes, that moves on its own will to destroy everything in a display of wrath. In the case somebody wears it, then in response to any resistance it will cause pain enough to kill the wearer, before possessing the corpse to continue on its wrathful rampage.

It was worn by Darkness in order to relocate and subdue it, before it was used as an ingredient. A set of unnamed and undescribed clothes the man in black robes generated using the School Invidia, Idol Superbia, Sexy Luxuria, and Armour of Wrath as ingredients, and can imbue its wearer with superhuman power.

It was taken by Kazuma to wear right after generation, accordingly killing him with pain before his companions ripped it up.

To aid intimate heroines[]

Waitress dress for Aqua that facilitates her waitress work. Nekomata costume for Megumin to help her understand the feelings of a cat. Bikini armour for Darkness to feel humiliated in. Short skirt for Chris to go dating Kazuma in. School uniform based on a gal-game's main heroine for Wiz to wear before selling to maniacs. Wedding dress Yunyun generated for saving Kazuma from execution. Cute bunny sleepwear for Sena so she can feel relaxed.

Trivia[]

The clothes requested by the nobleman use in the latter half of their names the Latin translations of the Seven Sins, and accordingly make the wearers feel the corresponding emotions.
